A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I actually liked it better than the force awakens because it was at least an original story (although Rey undergoes the most half assed Jedi training ever). My biggest pet peeve was when Leia went flying out of the command bridge into space and they magically gave her force powers and the ability to breathe outside. Carrie Fishers acting was distracting because her nose was so stuffy from all the Coke she's been doing.
